title: Marykeller
author: Marykeller
content: After the rulership of the military regime in Nigeria in 1999, the civilian come take over the mantle of ridership immediately. Since the civilian come take over, Nigeria has been ruled by different civilian presidents since then(1999) till now.Â The first Nigerian civilian president na ''Olusegun Obasanjo'', followed by Umaru Yar'adua, Goodluck Jonathan, and lastly our current present Muhammadu Buhari. Annual GDP(Gross Domestic Product) growth rate statistics are provided for each administration for us to know their performance one after the other. How una take see this annual GDP growth for each administration? Base on your own rating, how do you rate each administration, and which one wey sweet you pass when em d rule the country? For my own case na Obasanjo and late Yar'adua sweet me pass
